mapper.select: /** CommonCode.selectMxSortNum */ SELECT IFNULL(MAX(SORT_NUM), 0)+1 MXCNT FROM TB_FOR_CMM_CD WHERE PRT_CMM_CD=#{prtCmmCd } AND IS_DEL='N'
mapper.insert: /** CommonCode.insertCode */ INSERT INTO TB_FOR_CMM_CD ( CMM_CD, CMM_CD_NM, LVL, PRT_CMM_CD, CD_DESC, SORT_NUM, USE_YN, IS_DEL, INSRT_ID, INSRT_DATE, UPDT_ID, UPDT_DATE ) VALUES ( #{cmmCd}, #{cmmCdNm}, #{lvl}, #{prtCmmCd}, #{cdDesc}, #{sortNum}, #{useYn}, 'N', #{insrtId}, now(), #{insrtId}, now() )
mapper.select: /** CommonCode.selectCode */ SELECT CMM_CD, CMM_CD_NM, LVL, PRT_CMM_CD, CD_DESC, SORT_NUM, USE_YN, INSRT_ID, INSRT_DATE, UPDT_ID, UPDT_DATE FROM TB_FOR_CMM_CD WHERE CMM_CD=#{value} AND IS_DEL='N'

/** CommonCode.selectGroupCodeList */ SELECT CMM_CD, CMM_CD_NM, LVL, PRT_CMM_CD, CD_DESC, SORT_NUM, USE_YN, INSRT_ID, INSRT_DATE, UPDT_ID, UPDT_DATE FROM TB_FOR_CMM_CD WHERE PRT_CMM_CD='KNIA' AND LVL=1 AND IS_DEL='N' ORDER BY SORT_NUM

/** CommonCode.selectCodeList */ SELECT CMM_CD, CMM_CD_NM, LVL, PRT_CMM_CD, CD_DESC, SORT_NUM, USE_YN, INSRT_ID, INSRT_DATE, UPDT_ID, UPDT_DATE FROM TB_FOR_CMM_CD WHERE PRT_CMM_CD=#{value} AND IS_DEL='N'
mapper.update: /** CommonCode.updateCode */ UPDATE TB_FOR_CMM_CD SET CMM_CD_NM=#{cmmCdNm}, CD_DESC=#{cmmDesc}, SORT_NUM=#{sortNum}, USE_YN=#{useYn}, IS_DEL=#{isDel}, UPDT_ID=#{updtId}, UPDT_DATE=now() WHERE CMM_CD=#{cmmCd}
